content.text:
# Draft:List of awards and nominations received by Bella Ramsey

}}
Bella Ramsey is an English actor who has received multiple awards and nominations for their work in film, short film and television. Their accolades include nominations for a British Academy Television Award, two  Critics' Choice Awards, two Primetime Emmy Awards, a Golden Globe Award, and two Screen Actor Guild Awards. Ramsey also holds a Guinness World Record as the youngest nominee for the British Academy Television Award for Best Actress.
Ramsey made their screen debut as Lyanna Mormont in the HBO fantasy series Game of Thrones (2016–2019). They went on to star as Mildred Hubble in The Worst Witch (2017–2020), winning the British Academy Children's Award for Best Young Performer. Their voice work as the titular character in the animated series Hilda (2018–2023) earned them nominations for two British Animation Awards.
In 2022, Ramsey took on their first lead film role in the medieval coming-of-age comedy Catherine Called Birdy, which earned them a nomination for a Critics' Choice Movie Award for Best Young Performer and recognition from several film critics associations. Their portrayal of a pregnant heroin addict in the prison drama Time (2023) won them the Royal Television Society Award for Female Supporting Actor.
For their role as Ellie in HBO’s The Last of Us (2023–present), Ramsey earned nominations for a British Academy Television Award, a  Critics' Choice Award, a Golden Globe Award, two Screen Actor Guild Awards, and two Primetime Emmy Awards, making them the youngest two-time nominee for Lead Actress in a Drama Series, and the first non-binary performer to receive multiple nominations.
Major associations
British Academy Television Awards
The British Academy Television Awards is an annual award show presented by the British Academy of Film and Television Arts. Ramsey has received one nomination.

Critics' Choice Awards
The Critics' Choice Awards is an annual award show presented by the Critics Choice Association to honour the best in cinematic, televised, and streaming achievement. Ramsey has received two nominations.

Emmy Awards
The Primetime Emmy Awards are presented annually by the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences (ATAS), the National Academy of Television Arts & Sciences (NATAS), and the International Academy of Television Arts and Sciences (IATAS) for artistic and technical merit in television. Ramsey has received two nominations.

Golden Globe Awards
The Golden Globe Awards are presented annually by the Hollywood Foreign Press Association recognizing excellence in film and television, both domestic and foreign. Ramsey has received one nomination.

Screen Actors Guild Awards
The Screen Actors Guild Awards are organized by the Screen Actors Guild‐American Federation of Television and Radio Artists. The awards aim to recognize excellent achievements in film and television. Ramsey has received three nominations.

The Australian Academy of Cinema and Television Arts Awards are presented annually by the Australian Academy of Cinema and Television Arts (AACTA) to recognize and honour achievements in the film and television industry. Ramsey has one nomination.

Astra Awards
The Astra Awards is an annual awards ceremony hosted by the Hollywood Creative Alliance to recognize achievements in the entertainment industry. The awards span categories in film, television, and digital media, honouring technical and creative excellence..

British Academy Children's Awards
The British Academy Children's Awards was an annual award show presented by the British Academy of Film and Television Arts. The final ceremony, the 25th British Academy Children's Awards, was held in November 2022. Ramsey has was one award from two nominations.

Critics' Choice Super Awards
The Critics' Choice Super Awards is an awards show presented annually by the Critics Choice Association to honour the finest in genre fiction film, television and home media releases, including action, superhero, horror, science fiction, fantasy, and animation releases. Ramsey has won two awards from four nominations.

The Royal Television Society Programme Awards, (often referred to as the RTS Awards) seek to recognise programmes or individuals who have made a positive and material contribution to their genre. Ramsey has won one award from two nominations.

Television Critics Association Awards
The TCA Awards are awards presented by the Television Critics Association in recognition of excellence in television. There are eleven categories, which are presented every summer towards the end of the organization's summer press tour. Ramsey has received one nomination.
